text: Porto Trombetas Airport is the airport serving the district of Porto Trombetas in Oriximiná, Brazil. It is operated by the mining company Mineração Rio do Norte S/A. ==Airlines and destinations== No scheduled flights operate at this airport. ==Access== The airport is located from downtown Porto Trombetas and from downtown Oriximiná. ==See also== *List of airports in Brazil ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Airports in Pará
title: Porto Trombetas Airport
